title: Himi 280
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Ko e me’a kuo mole,
‘I hotau fa’ahinga,
‘I he’etau angahala,
Ki hotau ‘Otua.
2.
Ko ‘etau mā’oni’oni,
Pea mo e poto,
Kuo tau liliu ‘o kovi,
Pea loto vale.
3.
Ko ‘etau kovi ko eni,
Ko e me’a lahi,
He ‘oku tu’utāmaki ai,
Hotau laumālie.
4.
Ka na’e tokonaki mai,
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
‘A e hifo fakalelei,
‘I he’etau hia.
5.
Koe’uhi ke tau hoko,
‘I he’etau tui,
Kia Sīsū, ko e ‘Eiki,
Tau tonuhia ai.
6.
Pea tau mā’oni’oni
Pea ma’u mo’oni,
‘A e Laumālie lelei,
Ke tau mo’ui ai. *
